name: Plastic Grades

description.varities: HDPE (High-Density Polyethylene), LDPE (Low-Density Polyethylene), PP (Polypropylene), PET (Polyethylene Terephthalate)

excerpt: We source and supply premium plastic grades, catering to the recycling and manufacturing industries. Our extensive inventory ensures a reliable supply for various applications, including packaging, automotive, consumer goods, and industrial uses.

name: Waste Paper

description.type: OCC11 / OCC12, Soft-mix Paper, Hard-mix Paper, ONP, ONIP

excerpt: We are able to supply 3000 MT of papers per month on regular base in both FAS & CNF.

name: Used Oil

description.varities: Engine oil, Marine fuel oil, Slop oil

excerpt: We are buying Engine oil, Marine fuel oil, Slop oil, etc from refineries, and selling to partner refineries. As of today, we have moved 10000MT oil.

name: Minerals

description.varities: Coal, Nickle, Iron Ore, Copper, Alluminium, Potash, Zinc

excerpt: We work directly with mining companies, producers, end sellers & end buyers. We have extensive experience of trading minerals.
